name: New York City Hall
reason: Primary function is government operations within a secure complex and parkland.

name: 9/11 Memorial & Museum
reason: Site is a dedicated national memorial and museum where large retail is inappropriate.

name: Central Park
reason: Designated public parkland with strict restrictions on commercial development within its boundaries.

name: Statue of Liberty
reason: Location is a federally protected national monument on an island requiring ferry access.

name: United Nations Headquarters
reason: Functions as a secure international diplomatic complex not zoned for general retail.

name: Times Square (Plaza Areas)
reason: Represents primarily public pedestrian plazas and streets unsuitable for a large grocery footprint.

name: Lower Manhattan Area (Battery Park City/Islands)
reason: Area dominated by parks, memorials, specific-use islands, and dense residential areas with limited large retail sites.

name: Financial District Core
reason: Extremely high real estate costs and dense office environment make finding suitable large retail space highly challenging.

name: Financial District / WTC Area
reason: High property costs, density, and proximity to secure/memorial sites create significant large retail constraints.
